Age: Role: Feature, Description: age of the patient [years]
Sex: Role: Feature, Description: sex of the patient [M: Male, F: Female]
ChestPainType: Role: Feature, Description: chest pain type [TA: Typical Angina, ATA: Atypical Angina, NAP: Non-Anginal Pain, ASY: Asymptomatic]
RestingBP: Role: Feature, Description: resting blood pressure [mm Hg]
FastingBS: Role: Feature, Description: fasting blood sugar [1: if FastingBS > 120 mg/dl, 0: otherwise]
RestingECG: Role: Feature, Description: resting electrocardiogram results [Normal: Normal, ST: having ST-T wave abnormality (T wave inversions and/or ST elevation or depression of > 0.05 mV), LVH: showing probable or definite left ventricular hypertrophy by Estes' criteria]
MaxHR: Role: Feature, Description: maximum heart rate achieved [Numeric value between 60 and 202]
ExerciseAngina: Role: Feature, Description: exercise-induced angina [Y: Yes, N: No]
Oldpeak: Role: Feature, Description: oldpeak = ST [Numeric value measured in depression]
ST_Slope: Role: Feature, Description: the slope of the peak exercise ST segment [Up: upsloping, Flat: flat, Down: downsloping]
HeartDisease: Role: Target, Description: output class [1: heart disease, 0: Normal]
